column4: Hey. I'm trying to install ubuntu 11.10 desktop on a computer from USB, but it wont boot. I get a message saying "No DEFAULT or UI configuration directive found!" Any ideas?
it does not boot from usb? how did you prepare your usb drive?
Followed the guide on ubuntu.com. I'm able to boot it on my laptop, but not my desktop.
any errors when setting up? did you select the right version of ubuntu in the usb installer?
No errors and right version yes.
